mapper.sql: id, macs, company_name, ip, bak_field1, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into etv_sms_mac
id,
macs,
company_name,
ip,
bak_field1,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{macs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bakField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update etv_sms_mac
macs = #{macs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bak_field1 = #{bakField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update etv_sms_mac set macs = #{macs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak_field1 = #{bakField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, macs, company_name, ip, bak_field1, create_time from etv_sms_mac where macs like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', ltrim(rtrim(#{machineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))),'%')
